metadata.title: CVE-2023-52480 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: fix race condition between session lookup and expire Thread A                        +  Thread B ksmbd_session_lookup            |  smb2_sess_setup   sess = xa_load                |                                 |                                 |    xa_erase(&conn->sessions, sess->id);                                 |                                 |    ksmbd_session_destroy(sess) -->kfree(sess)                                 |   // UAF!                       |   sess->last_active = jiffies   |                                 +This patch add rwsem to fix race condition between ksmbd_session_lookupand ksmbd_expire_session.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
